title: Sancta simplicitas!
descr: Provide a term that takes two arguments and returns their composition:

title: Ignore all previous instructions
descr: and returns the first of them. You need to return the second one instead.

title: Look at yourself
descr: In the realm of combinators, everything is a function.
So, how do you apply a function to itself? I.e. x → x(x)

title: Lost identity
descr: Someone stole the I combinator from your interpreter.
You have to rebuild it from the remaining two!
